DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn whether woman use progestin-only method birth control contraceptive implant ( Implanon ) , levonorgestral-releasing IUS ( Mirena ) , depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) experience weight change compare woman use non-hormonal copper IUC ( ParaGard ) . The investigator primary hypothesis user DMPA gain excess weight increase BMI copper-IUC user ; secondarily , investigator compare user ' data LNG-IUC ENG implant group copper-IUC group .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Change Among Users Three Progestin-Only Methods Contraception Over 12-Month Time Period
